header.description: Crafting <b>high-performance, cross-platform<b> mobile applications with <b>Flutter<b>. Transforming ideas into elegant, user-friendly apps for iOS and Android.

skills.title: Building digital experiences
skills.description: I specialize in creating stunning user interfaces and developing high-quality applications that stand out.

flutter_and_dart.title: Flutter & Dart
flutter_and_dart.description: Expert in building cross-platform apps with Flutter framework and Dart programming language.

cross_platform.title: Cross-Platform
cross_platform.description: Single codebase for iOS and Android, ensuring consistent user experience across platforms.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Optimized apps with smooth animations, fast load times, and efficient resource usage.

ui_ux_design.title: UI/UX Design
ui_ux_design.description: Implementing beautiful, intuitive interfaces following Material Design and Cupertino guidelines.

state_management.title: State Management
state_management.description: Proficient in BLoC, Provider, Riverpod, and MobX for scalable app architecture.

ci_cd.title: CI/CD
ci_cd.description: Automated testing and deployment pipelines for reliable app releases.

projects.title: My projects
projects.description: A showcase of mobile applications I've built or participated in.

octa.title: Octa Trading Lessons
octa.description:
Octa Trading Lessons App is a free training tool for anyone who wants to understand various aspects of trading and investing.
In this app, you will learn directly from expert traders and immediately put your knowledge to practice while trading.

irealt.title: iRealt
irealt.description:
A simple and convenient service for professional and novice realtors.
Real estate directly from the developer with a high commission payment on the day of the transaction.

seline.title: Seline Clinic Dubai
seline.description:
Seline Aesthetic Clinic App — your streamlined companion for booking treatments, earning loyalty points, and reviewing appointment details, all in one secure platform.
Designed to enhance your aesthetic experience, this app ensures you can focus on what truly matters: feeling confident and refreshed.

doto.title: Doto
doto.description:
Doto is an easy-to-use mobile trading app that helps you trade smarter and make data-driven decisions.
Just get the app and start trading on stocks, indices and a lot more — the world’s top instruments are at your fingertips.

emcd.title: EMCD
emcd.description:
EMCD is one of the largest mining pool in Europe with total hashrate of 20+ EH/s and many other features.
It is a crypto wallet, p2p exchange, mining pool, crypto loans, coinhold and more.

fakelab.title: Fakelab Records MiniApp
fakelab.description:
A simple and convenient Telegram MiniApp for recording studio, developed on Flutter Web.
The application allows you to view information about the studio, book a visit or order services. A CRM panel for administrators and Telegram bot on Dart was developed along with the application.

contact.title: Bringing your ideas to life
contact.description: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. Let's create something amazing together.

status.unavailable: Unavailable for new projects for a while

footer.description: Designed in Figma. Developed with Flutter Web. Hosted with Vercel
